post:
Good day LET. I'm trying to collate all my VPS's for easier management. This has left one of my BlueVM VPS idle. I fear he has become quite lonely and I would very much like to give him a nice home with lots of attention. 

    2048 MB RAM
    2048 MB vSwap
    100 GB Disk
    4 vCPU
    OpenVZ
    1x IPv4 address
    3 TB Bandwidth (Gigabit port)

Great connections to all of America. 55 days up-time. Never had issues with support. Using the new Feather panel. 

$45/year recurring. ~6 months left of current cycle. 

Asking for $23 via Paypal or Google Wallet.

If interested, I am available via PM.

![](http://i.imgur.com/POYtf8Y.png)
